title: Emerald Cascade Haaram: A Timeless Treasure
materials: 22K Gold with Hyderabadi Polish; AAA-Grade Emeralds (Oval Cut
Excellent Clarity); High-Quality Cubic Zirconia (CZ) stones.
features: This stunning multi-layered haaram features intricate floral motifs accented with sparkling CZs, enhancing the natural beauty of the oval-cut emeralds. It has a vintage design that is classic. The layers create a cascade effect, adding depth and dimension. The pendant features traditional bead dangles at the bottom for a touch of South Indian flair.
occasions: and festive celebrations like Sankranthi or Ugadi. Also suitable for upscale social events seeking a touch of traditional elegance.
